trans-unit.source: Specifies the appearance of a <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref>
trans-unit.target: 모양을 지정는<xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.DrawingAttributes%2A> property to specify settings such as color, width, transparency, and the shape of the stylus tip for a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.DrawingAttributes%2A>색, 너비, 투명도, <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> 스타일러스 팁의 모양을 등의 설정을 지정 하는 속성</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.DrawingAttributes%2A> 을 사용 하 여

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.DefaultDrawingAttributes%2A> property to specify the drawing attributes for the strokes added to an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.DefaultDrawingAttributes%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> 에 추가 된 선에 대 한 그리기 특성을 지정 하는 속성</xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.DefaultDrawingAttributes%2A> 을 사용 하 여

trans-unit.source: Only strokes that are added after the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.DefaultDrawingAttributes%2A> undergo change show the updated attributes.
trans-unit.target: 스트로크에 뒤에 추가는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.DefaultDrawingAttributes%2A>업데이트 된 특성이 변경 표시를 진행 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.DefaultDrawingAttributes%2A>

trans-unit.source: The appearance of the strokes that are already on the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> does not change.
trans-unit.target: 에 이미 있는 선의 모양은 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>변경 되지 않습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of the DrawingAttributes class, see the DrawingAttributes constructor.
trans-unit.target: DrawingAttributes 클래스의 인스턴스에 대 한 초기 속성 값 목록은 DrawingAttributes 생성자를 참조 하십시오.

trans-unit.target: | 속성 | 초기 값 | |--------------|-------------------| | <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Color%2A>| 블랙 | | <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.FitToCurve%2A>| `false`| | <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Height%2A>| 장치 독립적 픽셀 (DIP) | | <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.IgnorePressure%2A>| `false`| | <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.IsHighlighter%2A>| `false`| | <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTip%2A>| <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StylusTip?displayProperty=fullName>| | <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTipTransform%2A>| <xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix.Identity%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| | <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Width%2A>|2 DIP|</xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Width%2A></xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix.Identity%2A?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTipTransform%2A></xref:System.Windows.Ink.StylusTip?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTip%2A></xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.IsHighlighter%2A></xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.IgnorePressure%2A></xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Height%2A></xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.FitToCurve%2A></xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Color%2A>

trans-unit.source: `propertyData` must be of type <xref:System.Char>, <xref:System.Byte>, <xref:System.Int16>, <xref:System.UInt16>, <xref:System.Int32>, <xref:System.UInt32>, <xref:System.Int64>, <xref:System.UInt64>, <xref:System.Single>, <xref:System.Double>, <xref:System.DateTime>, <xref:System.Boolean>, <xref:System.String>, <xref:System.Decimal> or an array of these data types; however it cannot be an array of type <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: `propertyData`형식 이어야 합니다 <xref:System.Char>, <xref:System.Byte>, <xref:System.Int16>, <xref:System.UInt16>, <xref:System.Int32>, <xref:System.UInt32>, <xref:System.Int64>, <xref:System.UInt64>, <xref:System.Single>, <xref:System.Double>, <xref:System.DateTime>, <xref:System.Boolean>, <xref:System.String>, <xref:System.Decimal>또는 이러한 데이터의 배열 형식, 단 <xref:System.String>.</xref:System.String> 형식의 배열을 않아야</xref:System.Decimal> </xref:System.String> </xref:System.Boolean> </xref:System.DateTime> </xref:System.Double> </xref:System.Single> </xref:System.UInt64> </xref:System.Int64> </xref:System.UInt32> </xref:System.Int32> </xref:System.UInt16> </xref:System.Int16> </xref:System.Byte> </xref:System.Char>

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes"></xref> object is equal to the current <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 확인 여부를 지정 된 <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes"> </xref> 현재 개체가 같은지 <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes"> </xref> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: Two <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> objects are equal if the following properties are equal: - <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Color%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTip%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTipTransform%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Width%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Height%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.IgnorePressure%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.FitToCurve%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.IsHighlighter%2A> > [!NOTE] > The Equals method does not check the custom properties for equality.
trans-unit.target: 두 개의 <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes>개체는 다음 속성이 같은지:- <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Color%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTip%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTipTransform%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Width%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Height%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.IgnorePressure%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.FitToCurve%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.IsHighlighter%2A>> [!NOTE] > The Equals 메서드 같음에 대 한 사용자 지정 속성을 확인 하지 않습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.IsHighlighter%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.FitToCurve%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.IgnorePressure%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Height%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Width%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTipTransform%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTip%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Color%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes"></xref> object to compare to the current <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes"></xref> object.

trans-unit.target: 그리는 데 사용 되는 스타일러스의 높이 가져오거나 설정 합니다.는 <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The following factors affect the height and width of a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> when it is rendered, but not the value of the Height property.
trans-unit.target: 다음 요인의 너비와 높이 영향을 줄는 <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>렌더링할 때 있지만 Height 속성 값이 아니라.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>

trans-unit.source: - The amount of pressure applied to the stylus when the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> is drawn.
trans-unit.target: -스타일러스에 적용 되는 압력 양을 때는 <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>그려집니다.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>

trans-unit.source: If you set the Height property to 0 device independent pixels (DIP), it is changed to 2 DIP.
trans-unit.target: 장치 독립적 픽셀 (DIP)를 Height 속성을 설정 하는 경우 DIP를 2로 변경 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the thickness of a rendered <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> changes according the amount of pressure applied.
trans-unit.target: 표시 하는 값을 가져오거나 설정 합니다. 여부는 렌더링 된의 두께 <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref> 적용 된 압력에 따라 변경 합니다.

trans-unit.target: # # XAML 텍스트 사용 XAML에서이 속성은 일반적으로 사용 되지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate that the thickness of the stroke is uniform; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to indicate that the thickness of a rendered <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> increases when pressure is increased.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>스트로크의 두께 uniform; 임을 나타내기 위해 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> 나타내기 위해 렌더링 된의 두께 <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref> 압력 증가 하는 경우 증가 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> looks like a highlighter.
trans-unit.target: 표시 하는 값을 가져오거나 설정 합니다. 여부는 <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref> 는 highlighter 것 같습니다.

trans-unit.source: When the IsHighlighter property is set to `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> is slightly transparent, which allows the strokes underneath to appear.
trans-unit.target: IsHighlighter 속성이로 설정 된 경우 `true`, <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>은 약간을 허용 하는 아래 선을 표시 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Text Usage This property is not typically used in XAML.
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 텍스트 사용 XAML에서이 속성은 일반적으로 사용 되지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to render the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> as a highlighter; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>렌더링 하는 <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref> highlighter;으로 그렇지 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the largest value allowed for the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Height*> property.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 허용 되는 가장 큰 값을 지정 된 <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Height*>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Height*>

trans-unit.source: Use the MaxHeight field to check whether a value is within the limits allowed for the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Height%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 최대 높이 필드를 사용 하 여 값이 허용 된 제한 내에 있는지 확인 하 고 <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Height%2A>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Height%2A>

trans-unit.source: Do this when the value comes from an unknown source, such as unconstrained user input.
trans-unit.target: 값 제약 알 수 없는 소스에서 제공 하는 경우이 작업을 수행 합니다.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 추가할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Use the MinHeight field to check whether a value is within the limits allowed for the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Height%2A> property.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.AttributeChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 발생 된 <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.AttributeChanged"> </xref> 이벤트입니다.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 이벤트를 발생 시키는 대리자를 통해 이벤트 처리기를 호출 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The OnAttributeChanged method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: OnAttributeChanged 메서드는 파생된 클래스가 대리자를 연결 하지 않고도 이벤트를 처리할를 수도 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 이 파생된 클래스에서 이벤트를 처리 하는 기본 방법입니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.PropertyDataChangedEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.PropertyDataChangedEventArgs"> </xref> 하는 이벤트 데이터를 포함 합니다.

trans-unit.source: e is .
trans-unit.target: eis .

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.

trans-unit.source: The OnPropertyDataChanged method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event.

trans-unit.target: eis .

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes"></xref> objects are equal.
trans-unit.target: 확인 여부를 지정 된 <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes"> </xref> 개체는 동일 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Two <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> objects are equal if the following properties are equal: - <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Color%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.FitToCurve%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Height%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.IgnorePressure%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.IsHighlighter%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTip%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTipTransform%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Width%2A> > [!NOTE] > The Equality method does not check the custom properties for equality.
trans-unit.target: 두 개의 <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes>개체는 다음 속성이 같은지:- <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Color%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.FitToCurve%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Height%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.IgnorePressure%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.IsHighlighter%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTip%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTipTransform%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Width%2A>> [!NOTE] > The 같음 메서드 같음에 대 한 사용자 지정 속성을 확인 하지 않습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Width%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTipTransform%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTip%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.IsHighlighter%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.IgnorePressure%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Height%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.FitToCurve%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Color%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes>

trans-unit.source: The first <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes"></xref> object to compare.
trans-unit.target: 첫 번째 <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes"> </xref> 비교할 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: The second <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes"></xref> object to compare.
trans-unit.target: 두 번째 <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes"> </xref> 비교할 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the objects are equal; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>개체가 동일 하면 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes"></xref> objects are not equal.
trans-unit.target: 확인 여부를 지정 된 <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes"> </xref> 개체가 같지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: Two <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> objects are not equal if the following properties are not equal: - <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Color%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.FitToCurve%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Height%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.IgnorePressure%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.IsHighlighter%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTip%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTipTransform%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Width%2A> > [!NOTE] > The Inequality method does not check the custom properties for equality.
trans-unit.target: 두 개의 <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes>개체가 다르면 다음과 같은 속성이 다르면:- <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Color%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.FitToCurve%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Height%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.IgnorePressure%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.IsHighlighter%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTip%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTipTransform%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Width%2A>> [!NOTE] > The 같지 않음 메서드 같음에 대 한 사용자 지정 속성을 확인 하지 않습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Width%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTipTransform%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTip%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.IsHighlighter%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.IgnorePressure%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Height%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.FitToCurve%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Color%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes>

trans-unit.source: The first <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes"></xref> object to compare.
trans-unit.target: 첫 번째 <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes"> </xref> 비교할 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: The second <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes"></xref> object to compare.
trans-unit.target: 두 번째 <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes"> </xref> 비교할 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the objects are not equal; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>개체가 같지 않으면 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.target: 추가할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the shape of the stylus used to draw the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 그리는 데 사용 되는 위에 있는 셰이프를 가져오거나 설정 합니다.는 <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Text Usage This property is not typically used in XAML.
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 텍스트 사용 XAML에서이 속성은 일반적으로 사용 되지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StylusShape"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 중 하나는 <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StylusShape"> </xref> 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Matrix"></xref> that specifies the transformation to perform on the stylus' tip.
trans-unit.target: 가져오거나는 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Matrix"> </xref> 스타일러스의 끝에서 수행할 변환을 지정 하는 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Use the StylusTipTransform property to rotate, skew, or scale the stylus tip.
trans-unit.target: 회전 기울이거나 스타일러스 팁의 크기를 조정 하려면 StylusTipTransform 속성을 사용 합니다.

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Text Usage This property is not typically used in XAML.
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 텍스트 사용 XAML에서이 속성은 일반적으로 사용 되지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Matrix"></xref> that specifies the transformation to perform on the stylus' tip.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Matrix"> </xref> 스타일러스의 끝에서 수행할 변환을 지정 하는 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The matrix set to StylusTipTransform is not an invertible matrix.
trans-unit.target: StylusTipTransform로 설정 하는 행렬 반전할 수 행렬이 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: -or- The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix.OffsetX*> or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix.OffsetY*> property of the matrix is not zero.
trans-unit.target: -또는- <> </> *> 또는 <> </> *> 행렬의 속성이&0; 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the width of the stylus used to draw the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 그리는 데 사용 되는 스타일러스의 너비를 가져오거나 설정 합니다.는 <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The following factors affect the height and width of a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> when it is rendered, but not the value of the Width property.
trans-unit.target: 다음 요인의 너비와 높이 영향을 줄는 <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>렌더링할 때 있지만 Width 속성 값이 아니라.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>

trans-unit.source: - The amount of pressure applied to the stylus when the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> is drawn.
trans-unit.target: -스타일러스에 적용 되는 압력 양을 때는 <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>그려집니다.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>

trans-unit.source: - The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTipTransform%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: -의 값은 <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTipTransform%2A>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTipTransform%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you set the Width property to 0 device independent pixels (DIP), it is changed to 2 DIP.
trans-unit.target: 장치 독립적 픽셀 (DIP)를 Width 속성을 설정 하는 경우 DIP를 2로 변경 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Text Usage This property is not typically used in XAML.
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 텍스트 사용 XAML에서이 속성은 일반적으로 사용 되지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: The width of the stylus used to draw the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 그리는 데 사용 되는 스타일러스의 너비는 <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The Width property is less than <xref:System.Double.Epsilon?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Double.NaN?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Width 속성은 보다 작은 <xref:System.Double.Epsilon?displayProperty=fullName> 또는 <xref:System.Double.NaN?displayProperty=fullName>합니다.
